131 /**
132  * HMaster is the "master server" for HBase. An HBase cluster has one active
133  * master.  If many masters are started, all compete.  Whichever wins goes on to
134  * run the cluster.  All others park themselves in their constructor until
135  * master or cluster shutdown or until the active master loses its lease in
136  * zookeeper.  Thereafter, all running master jostle to take over master role.
137  *
138  * <p>The Master can be asked shutdown the cluster. See {@link #shutdown()}.  In
139  * this case it will tell all regionservers to go down and then wait on them
140  * all reporting in that they are down.  This master will then shut itself down.
141  *
142  * <p>You can also shutdown just this master.  Call {@link #stopMaster()}.
143  *
144  * @see HMasterInterface
145  * @see HMasterRegionInterface
146  * @see Watcher
147  */
148 public class HMaster extends HasThread
149 implements HMasterInterface, HMasterRegionInterface, MasterServices,
150 Server {
151   private static final Log LOG = LogFactory.getLog(HMaster.class.getName());
152

253   /**
254    * Initializes the HMaster. The steps are as follows:
255    * <p>
256    * <ol>
257    * <li>Initialize HMaster RPC and address
258    * <li>Connect to ZooKeeper.
259    * </ol>
260    * <p>
261    * Remaining steps of initialization occur in {@link #run()} so that they
262    * run in their own thread rather than within the context of the constructor.
263    * @throws InterruptedException
264    */
265   public HMaster(final Configuration conf)
266   throws IOException, KeeperException, InterruptedException {
267     this.conf = new Configuration(conf);
268     // Disable the block cache on the master
269     this.conf.setFloat(HConstants.HFILE_BLOCK_CACHE_SIZE_KEY, 0.0f);
270     // Set how many times to retry talking to another server over HConnection.
271     HConnectionManager.setServerSideHConnectionRetries(this.conf, LOG);
272     // Server to handle client requests.
273     String hostname = Strings.domainNamePointerToHostName(DNS.getDefaultHost(
274       conf.get("hbase.master.dns.interface", "default"),
275       conf.get("hbase.master.dns.nameserver", "default")));
276     int port = conf.getInt(HConstants.MASTER_PORT, HConstants.DEFAULT_MASTER_PORT);
277     // Test that the hostname is reachable
278     InetSocketAddress initialIsa = new InetSocketAddress(hostname, port);
279     if (initialIsa.getAddress() == null) {
280       throw new IllegalArgumentException("Failed resolve of hostname " + initialIsa);
281     }
282     // Verify that the bind address is reachable if set
283     String bindAddress = conf.get("hbase.master.ipc.address");
284     if (bindAddress != null) {
285       initialIsa = new InetSocketAddress(bindAddress, port);
286       if (initialIsa.getAddress() == null) {
287         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Failed resolve of bind address " + initialIsa);
288       }
289     }
290     int numHandlers = conf.getInt("hbase.master.handler.count",
291       conf.getInt("hbase.regionserver.handler.count", 25));
292     this.rpcServer = HBaseRPC.getServer(this,
293       new Class<?>[]{HMasterInterface.class, HMasterRegionInterface.class},
294         initialIsa.getHostName(), // This is bindAddress if set else it's hostname
295         initialIsa.getPort(),
296         numHandlers,
297         0, // we dont use high priority handlers in master
298         conf.getBoolean("hbase.rpc.verbose", false), conf,
299         0); // this is a DNC w/o high priority handlers
300     // Set our address.
301     this.isa = this.rpcServer.getListenerAddress();
302     this.serverName = new ServerName(hostname,
303       this.isa.getPort(), System.currentTimeMillis());
304     this.rsFatals = new MemoryBoundedLogMessageBuffer(
305         conf.getLong("hbase.master.buffer.for.rs.fatals", 1*1024*1024));
306 
307     // login the zookeeper client principal (if using security)
308     ZKUtil.loginClient(this.conf, "hbase.zookeeper.client.keytab.file",
309       "hbase.zookeeper.client.kerberos.principal", this.isa.getHostName());
310 
311     // initialize server principal (if using secure Hadoop)
312     User.login(conf, "hbase.master.keytab.file",
313       "hbase.master.kerberos.principal", this.isa.getHostName());
314 
315     // set the thread name now we have an address
316     setName(MASTER + "-" + this.serverName.toString());
317 
318     Replication.decorateMasterConfiguration(this.conf);
319 
320     // Hack! Maps DFSClient => Master for logs.  HDFS made this
321     // config param for task trackers, but we can piggyback off of it.
322     if (this.conf.get("mapred.task.id") == null) {
323       this.conf.set("mapred.task.id", "hb_m_" + this.serverName.toString());
324     }
325 
326     this.zooKeeper = new ZooKeeperWatcher(conf, MASTER + ":" + isa.getPort(), this, true);
327     this.rpcServer.startThreads();
328     this.metrics = new MasterMetrics(getServerName().toString());
329 
330     // Health checker thread.
331     int sleepTime = this.conf.getInt(HConstants.HEALTH_CHORE_WAKE_FREQ,
332       HConstants.DEFAULT_THREAD_WAKE_FREQUENCY);
333     if (isHealthCheckerConfigured()) {
334       healthCheckChore = new HealthCheckChore(sleepTime, this, getConfiguration());
335     }
336   }
337 
338   /**
339    * Stall startup if we are designated a backup master; i.e. we want someone
340    * else to become the master before proceeding.
341    * @param c
342    * @param amm
343    * @throws InterruptedException
344    */
345   private static void stallIfBackupMaster(final Configuration c,
346       final ActiveMasterManager amm)
347   throws InterruptedException {
348     // If we're a backup master, stall until a primary to writes his address
349     if (!c.getBoolean(HConstants.MASTER_TYPE_BACKUP,
350       HConstants.DEFAULT_MASTER_TYPE_BACKUP)) {
351       return;
352     }
353     LOG.debug("HMaster started in backup mode.  " +
354       "Stalling until master znode is written.");
355     // This will only be a minute or so while the cluster starts up,
356     // so don't worry about setting watches on the parent znode
357     while (!amm.isActiveMaster()) {
358       LOG.debug("Waiting for master address ZNode to be written " +
359         "(Also watching cluster state node)");
360       Thread.sleep(c.getInt("zookeeper.session.timeout", 180 * 1000));
361     }
362     
363   }
364 
365   /**
366    * Main processing loop for the HMaster.
367    * <ol>
368    * <li>Block until becoming active master
369    * <li>Finish initialization via finishInitialization(MonitoredTask)
370    * <li>Enter loop until we are stopped
371    * <li>Stop services and perform cleanup once stopped
372    * </ol>
373    */
374   @Override
375   public void run() {
376     MonitoredTask startupStatus =
377       TaskMonitor.get().createStatus("Master startup");
378     startupStatus.setDescription("Master startup");
379     masterStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
380     try {
381       /*
382        * Block on becoming the active master.
383        *
384        * We race with other masters to write our address into ZooKeeper.  If we
385        * succeed, we are the primary/active master and finish initialization.
386        *
387        * If we do not succeed, there is another active master and we should
388        * now wait until it dies to try and become the next active master.  If we
389        * do not succeed on our first attempt, this is no longer a cluster startup.
390        */
391       becomeActiveMaster(startupStatus);
392 
393       // We are either the active master or we were asked to shutdown
394       if (!this.stopped) {
395         finishInitialization(startupStatus, false);
396         loop();
397       }
398     } catch (Throwable t) {
399       // HBASE-5680: Likely hadoop23 vs hadoop 20.x/1.x incompatibility
400       if (t instanceof NoClassDefFoundError && 
401           t.getMessage().contains("org/apache/hadoop/hdfs/protocol/FSConstants$SafeModeAction")) {
402           // improved error message for this special case
403           abort("HBase is having a problem with its Hadoop jars.  You may need to "
404               + "recompile HBase against Hadoop version "
405               +  org.apache.hadoop.util.VersionInfo.getVersion()
406               + " or change your hadoop jars to start properly", t);
407       } else {
408         abort("Unhandled exception. Starting shutdown.", t);
409       }
410     } finally {
411       startupStatus.cleanup();
412       
413       stopChores();
414       // Wait for all the remaining region servers to report in IFF we were
415       // running a cluster shutdown AND we were NOT aborting.
416       if (!this.abort && this.serverManager != null &&
417           this.serverManager.isClusterShutdown()) {
418         this.serverManager.letRegionServersShutdown();
419       }
420       stopServiceThreads();
421       // Stop services started for both backup and active masters
422       if (this.activeMasterManager != null) this.activeMasterManager.stop();
423       if (this.catalogTracker != null) this.catalogTracker.stop();
424       if (this.serverManager != null) this.serverManager.stop();
425       if (this.assignmentManager != null) this.assignmentManager.stop();
426       if (this.fileSystemManager != null) this.fileSystemManager.stop();
427       if (this.snapshotManager != null) this.snapshotManager.stop("server shutting down.");
428       this.zooKeeper.close();
429     }
430     LOG.info("HMaster main thread exiting");
431   }
432 
433   /**
434    * Try becoming active master.
435    * @param startupStatus 
436    * @return True if we could successfully become the active master.
437    * @throws InterruptedException
438    */
439   private boolean becomeActiveMaster(MonitoredTask startupStatus)
440   throws InterruptedException {
441     // TODO: This is wrong!!!! Should have new servername if we restart ourselves,
442     // if we come back to life.
443     this.activeMasterManager = new ActiveMasterManager(zooKeeper, this.serverName,
444         this);
445     this.zooKeeper.registerListener(activeMasterManager);
446     stallIfBackupMaster(this.conf, this.activeMasterManager);
447 
448     // The ClusterStatusTracker is setup before the other
449     // ZKBasedSystemTrackers because it's needed by the activeMasterManager
450     // to check if the cluster should be shutdown.
451     this.clusterStatusTracker = new ClusterStatusTracker(getZooKeeper(), this);
452     this.clusterStatusTracker.start();
453     return this.activeMasterManager.blockUntilBecomingActiveMaster(startupStatus,
454         this.clusterStatusTracker);
455   }
456 
457   /**
458    * Initialize all ZK based system trackers.
459    * @throws IOException
460    * @throws InterruptedException
461    */
462   private void initializeZKBasedSystemTrackers() throws IOException,
463       InterruptedException, KeeperException {
464     this.catalogTracker = new CatalogTracker(this.zooKeeper, this.conf, this);
465     this.catalogTracker.start();
466 
467     this.balancer = LoadBalancerFactory.getLoadBalancer(conf);
468     this.assignmentManager = new AssignmentManager(this, serverManager,
469         this.catalogTracker, this.balancer, this.executorService);
470     zooKeeper.registerListenerFirst(assignmentManager);
471 
472     this.regionServerTracker = new RegionServerTracker(zooKeeper, this,
473         this.serverManager);
474     this.regionServerTracker.start();
475 
476     this.drainingServerTracker = new DrainingServerTracker(zooKeeper, this,
477       this.serverManager);
478     this.drainingServerTracker.start();
479 
480     // Set the cluster as up.  If new RSs, they'll be waiting on this before
481     // going ahead with their startup.
482     boolean wasUp = this.clusterStatusTracker.isClusterUp();
483     if (!wasUp) this.clusterStatusTracker.setClusterUp();
484 
485     LOG.info("Server active/primary master; " + this.serverName +
486         ", sessionid=0x" +
487         Long.toHexString(this.zooKeeper.getRecoverableZooKeeper().getSessionId()) +
488         ", cluster-up flag was=" + wasUp);
489 
490     // create the snapshot manager
491     this.snapshotManager = new SnapshotManager(this, this.metrics);
492   }
493 
494   // Check if we should stop every second.
495   private Sleeper stopSleeper = new Sleeper(1000, this);
496   private void loop() {
497     while (!this.stopped) {
498       stopSleeper.sleep();
499     }
500   }
501 
502   /**
503    * Finish initialization of HMaster after becoming the primary master.
504    *
505    * <ol>
506    * <li>Initialize master components - file system manager, server manager,
507    *     assignment manager, region server tracker, catalog tracker, etc</li>
508    * <li>Start necessary service threads - rpc server, info server,
509    *     executor services, etc</li>
510    * <li>Set cluster as UP in ZooKeeper</li>
511    * <li>Wait for RegionServers to check-in</li>
512    * <li>Split logs and perform data recovery, if necessary</li>
513    * <li>Ensure assignment of root and meta regions<li>
514    * <li>Handle either fresh cluster start or master failover</li>
515    * </ol>
516    * @param masterRecovery 
517    *
518    * @throws IOException
519    * @throws InterruptedException
520    * @throws KeeperException
521    */
522   private void finishInitialization(MonitoredTask status, boolean masterRecovery)
523   throws IOException, InterruptedException, KeeperException {
524 
525     isActiveMaster = true;
526 
527     /*
528      * We are active master now... go initialize components we need to run.
529      * Note, there may be dross in zk from previous runs; it'll get addressed
530      * below after we determine if cluster startup or failover.
531      */
532 
533     status.setStatus("Initializing Master file system");
534     this.masterActiveTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
535     // TODO: Do this using Dependency Injection, using PicoContainer, Guice or Spring.
536     this.fileSystemManager = new MasterFileSystem(this, this, metrics, masterRecovery);
537 
538     this.tableDescriptors =
539       new FSTableDescriptors(this.fileSystemManager.getFileSystem(),
540       this.fileSystemManager.getRootDir());
541 
542     // publish cluster ID
543     status.setStatus("Publishing Cluster ID in ZooKeeper");
544     ClusterId.setClusterId(this.zooKeeper, fileSystemManager.getClusterId());
545     if (!masterRecovery) {
546       this.executorService = new ExecutorService(getServerName().toString());
547       this.serverManager = new ServerManager(this, this);
548     }
549 
550 
551     status.setStatus("Initializing ZK system trackers");
552     initializeZKBasedSystemTrackers();
553     
554     if (!masterRecovery) {
555       // initialize master side coprocessors before we start handling requests
556       status.setStatus("Initializing master coprocessors");
557       this.cpHost = new MasterCoprocessorHost(this, this.conf);
558 
559       // start up all service threads.
560       status.setStatus("Initializing master service threads");
561       startServiceThreads();
562     }
563 
564     // Wait for region servers to report in.
565     this.serverManager.waitForRegionServers(status);
566     // Check zk for regionservers that are up but didn't register
567     for (ServerName sn: this.regionServerTracker.getOnlineServers()) {
568       if (!this.serverManager.isServerOnline(sn)) {
569         // Not registered; add it.
570         LOG.info("Registering server found up in zk but who has not yet " +
571           "reported in: " + sn);
572         this.serverManager.recordNewServer(sn, HServerLoad.EMPTY_HSERVERLOAD);
573       }
574     }
575     if (!masterRecovery) {
576       this.assignmentManager.startTimeOutMonitor();
577     }
578     // TODO: Should do this in background rather than block master startup
579     status.setStatus("Splitting logs after master startup");
580     splitLogAfterStartup(this.fileSystemManager);
581 
582     // Make sure root and meta assigned before proceeding.
583     assignRootAndMeta(status);
584     enableServerShutdownHandler();
585 
586     // Update meta with new HRI if required. i.e migrate all HRI with HTD to
587     // HRI with out HTD in meta and update the status in ROOT. This must happen
588     // before we assign all user regions or else the assignment will fail.
589     // TODO: Remove this when we do 0.94.
590     org.apache.hadoop.hbase.catalog.MetaMigrationRemovingHTD.
591       updateMetaWithNewHRI(this);
592 
593     // Fixup assignment manager status
594     status.setStatus("Starting assignment manager");
595     this.assignmentManager.joinCluster();
596 
597     this.balancer.setClusterStatus(getClusterStatus());
598     this.balancer.setMasterServices(this);
599 
600     // Fixing up missing daughters if any
601     status.setStatus("Fixing up missing daughters");
602     fixupDaughters(status);
603 
604     if (!masterRecovery) {
605       // Start balancer and meta catalog janitor after meta and regions have
606       // been assigned.
607       status.setStatus("Starting balancer and catalog janitor");
608       this.balancerChore = getAndStartBalancerChore(this);
609       this.catalogJanitorChore = new CatalogJanitor(this, this);
610       startCatalogJanitorChore();
611       registerMBean();
612     }
613 
614     status.markComplete("Initialization successful");
615     LOG.info("Master has completed initialization");
616     initialized = true;
617 
618     // clear the dead servers with same host name and port of online server because we are not
619     // removing dead server with same hostname and port of rs which is trying to check in before
620     // master initialization. See HBASE-5916.
621     this.serverManager.clearDeadServersWithSameHostNameAndPortOfOnlineServer();
622     
623     if (!masterRecovery) {
624       if (this.cpHost != null) {
625         // don't let cp initialization errors kill the master
626         try {
627           this.cpHost.postStartMaster();
628         } catch (IOException ioe) {
629           LOG.error("Coprocessor postStartMaster() hook failed", ioe);
630         }
631       }
632     }
633   }

664   /**
665    * Check <code>-ROOT-</code> and <code>.META.</code> are assigned.  If not,
666    * assign them.
667    * @throws InterruptedException
668    * @throws IOException
669    * @throws KeeperException
670    * @return Count of regions we assigned.
671    */
672   int assignRootAndMeta(MonitoredTask status)
673   throws InterruptedException, IOException, KeeperException {
674     int assigned = 0;
675     long timeout = this.conf.getLong("hbase.catalog.verification.timeout", 1000);
676 
677     // Work on ROOT region.  Is it in zk in transition?
678     status.setStatus("Assigning ROOT region");
679     boolean rit = this.assignmentManager.
680       processRegionInTransitionAndBlockUntilAssigned(HRegionInfo.ROOT_REGIONINFO);
681     ServerName currentRootServer = null;
682     boolean rootRegionLocation = catalogTracker.verifyRootRegionLocation(timeout);
683     if (!rit && !rootRegionLocation) {
684       currentRootServer = this.catalogTracker.getRootLocation();
685       splitLogAndExpireIfOnline(currentRootServer);
686       this.assignmentManager.assignRoot();
687       waitForRootAssignment();
688       assigned++;
689     } else if (rit && !rootRegionLocation) {
690       waitForRootAssignment();
691       assigned++;
692     } else {
693       // Region already assigned. We didn't assign it. Add to in-memory state.
694       this.assignmentManager.regionOnline(HRegionInfo.ROOT_REGIONINFO,
695           this.catalogTracker.getRootLocation());
696     }
697     // Enable the ROOT table if on process fail over the RS containing ROOT
698     // was active.
699     enableCatalogTables(Bytes.toString(HConstants.ROOT_TABLE_NAME));
700     LOG.info("-ROOT- assigned=" + assigned + ", rit=" + rit +
701       ", location=" + catalogTracker.getRootLocation());
702 
703     // Work on meta region
704     status.setStatus("Assigning META region");
705     rit = this.assignmentManager.
706       processRegionInTransitionAndBlockUntilAssigned(HRegionInfo.FIRST_META_REGIONINFO);
707     boolean metaRegionLocation = this.catalogTracker.verifyMetaRegionLocation(timeout);
708     if (!rit && !metaRegionLocation) {
709       ServerName currentMetaServer =
710         this.catalogTracker.getMetaLocationOrReadLocationFromRoot();
711       if (currentMetaServer != null
712           && !currentMetaServer.equals(currentRootServer)) {
713         splitLogAndExpireIfOnline(currentMetaServer);
714       }
715       assignmentManager.assignMeta();
716       enableSSHandWaitForMeta();
717       assigned++;
718     } else if (rit && !metaRegionLocation) {
719       enableSSHandWaitForMeta();
720       assigned++;
721     } else {
722       // Region already assigned.  We didnt' assign it.  Add to in-memory state.
723       this.assignmentManager.regionOnline(HRegionInfo.FIRST_META_REGIONINFO,
724         this.catalogTracker.getMetaLocation());
725     }
726     enableCatalogTables(Bytes.toString(HConstants.META_TABLE_NAME));
727     LOG.info(".META. assigned=" + assigned + ", rit=" + rit +
728       ", location=" + catalogTracker.getMetaLocation());
729     status.setStatus("META and ROOT assigned.");
730     return assigned;
731   }
732 
733   private void enableSSHandWaitForMeta() throws IOException,
734       InterruptedException {
735     enableServerShutdownHandler();
736     this.catalogTracker.waitForMeta();
737     // Above check waits for general meta availability but this does not
738     // guarantee that the transition has completed
739     this.assignmentManager
740         .waitForAssignment(HRegionInfo.FIRST_META_REGIONINFO);
741   }

743   private void waitForRootAssignment() throws InterruptedException {
744     this.catalogTracker.waitForRoot();
745     // This guarantees that the transition has completed
746     this.assignmentManager.waitForAssignment(HRegionInfo.ROOT_REGIONINFO);
747   }

755   void fixupDaughters(final MonitoredTask status) throws IOException {
756     final Map<HRegionInfo, Result> offlineSplitParents =
757       new HashMap<HRegionInfo, Result>();
758     // This visitor collects offline split parents in the .META. table
759     MetaReader.Visitor visitor = new MetaReader.Visitor() {
760       @Override
761       public boolean visit(Result r) throws IOException {
762         if (r == null || r.isEmpty()) return true;
763         HRegionInfo info =
764           MetaReader.parseHRegionInfoFromCatalogResult(
765             r, HConstants.REGIONINFO_QUALIFIER);
766         if (info == null) return true; // Keep scanning
767         if (info.isOffline() && info.isSplit()) {
768           offlineSplitParents.put(info, r);
769         }
770         // Returning true means "keep scanning"
771         return true;
772       }
773     };
774     // Run full scan of .META. catalog table passing in our custom visitor
775     MetaReader.fullScan(this.catalogTracker, visitor);
776     // Now work on our list of found parents. See if any we can clean up.
777     int fixups = 0;
778     for (Map.Entry<HRegionInfo, Result> e : offlineSplitParents.entrySet()) {
779       fixups += ServerShutdownHandler.fixupDaughters(
780           e.getValue(), assignmentManager, catalogTracker);
781     }
782     if (fixups != 0) {
783       LOG.info("Scanned the catalog and fixed up " + fixups +
784         " missing daughter region(s)");
785     }
786   }

788   /**
789    * Split a server's log and expire it if we find it is one of the online
790    * servers.
791    * @param sn ServerName to check.
792    * @throws IOException
793    */
794   private void splitLogAndExpireIfOnline(final ServerName sn)
795       throws IOException {
796     if (sn == null || !serverManager.isServerOnline(sn)) {
797       return;
798     }
799     LOG.info("Forcing splitLog and expire of " + sn);
800     fileSystemManager.splitLog(sn);
801     serverManager.expireServer(sn);
802   }

807   throws IOException {

810     } else if (HMasterRegionInterface.class.getName().equals(protocol)) {

865   /*
866    * Start up all services. If any of these threads gets an unhandled exception
867    * then they just die with a logged message.  This should be fine because
868    * in general, we do not expect the master to get such unhandled exceptions
869    *  as OOMEs; it should be lightly loaded. See what HRegionServer does if
870    *  need to install an unexpected exception handler.
871    */
872   private void startServiceThreads() throws IOException{
873  
874    // Start the executor service pools
875    this.executorService.startExecutorService(ExecutorType.MASTER_OPEN_REGION,
876       conf.getInt("hbase.master.executor.openregion.threads", 5));
877    this.executorService.startExecutorService(ExecutorType.MASTER_CLOSE_REGION,
878       conf.getInt("hbase.master.executor.closeregion.threads", 5));
879    this.executorService.startExecutorService(ExecutorType.MASTER_SERVER_OPERATIONS,
880       conf.getInt("hbase.master.executor.serverops.threads", 3));
881    this.executorService.startExecutorService(ExecutorType.MASTER_META_SERVER_OPERATIONS,
882       conf.getInt("hbase.master.executor.serverops.threads", 5));
883    
884    // We depend on there being only one instance of this executor running
885    // at a time.  To do concurrency, would need fencing of enable/disable of
886    // tables.
887    this.executorService.startExecutorService(ExecutorType.MASTER_TABLE_OPERATIONS, 1);
888 
889    // Start log cleaner thread
890    String n = Thread.currentThread().getName();
891    int cleanerInterval = conf.getInt("hbase.master.cleaner.interval", 60 * 1000);
892    this.logCleaner =
893       new LogCleaner(cleanerInterval,
894          this, conf, getMasterFileSystem().getFileSystem(),
895          getMasterFileSystem().getOldLogDir());
896          Threads.setDaemonThreadRunning(logCleaner.getThread(), n + ".oldLogCleaner");
897 
898    //start the hfile archive cleaner thread
899     Path archiveDir = HFileArchiveUtil.getArchivePath(conf);
900     this.hfileCleaner = new HFileCleaner(cleanerInterval, this, conf, getMasterFileSystem()
901         .getFileSystem(), archiveDir);
902     Threads.setDaemonThreadRunning(hfileCleaner.getThread(), n + ".archivedHFileCleaner");
903 
904    // Put up info server.
905    int port = this.conf.getInt("hbase.master.info.port", 60010);
906    if (port >= 0) {
907      String a = this.conf.get("hbase.master.info.bindAddress", "0.0.0.0");
908      this.infoServer = new InfoServer(MASTER, a, port, false, this.conf);
909      this.infoServer.addServlet("status", "/master-status", MasterStatusServlet.class);
910      this.infoServer.addServlet("dump", "/dump", MasterDumpServlet.class);
911      this.infoServer.setAttribute(MASTER, this);
912      this.infoServer.start();
913     }
914 
915    // Start the health checker
916    if (this.healthCheckChore != null) {
917      Threads.setDaemonThreadRunning(this.healthCheckChore.getThread(), n + ".healthChecker");
918    }
919 
920     // Start allowing requests to happen.
921     this.rpcServer.openServer();
922     if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {
923       LOG.debug("Started service threads");
924     }
925 
926   }
927 
928   private void stopServiceThreads() {
929     if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {
930       LOG.debug("Stopping service threads");
931     }
932     if (this.rpcServer != null) this.rpcServer.stop();
933     // Clean up and close up shop
934     if (this.logCleaner!= null) this.logCleaner.interrupt();
935     if (this.hfileCleaner != null) this.hfileCleaner.interrupt();
936 
937     if (this.infoServer != null) {
938       LOG.info("Stopping infoServer");
939       try {
940         this.infoServer.stop();
941       } catch (Exception ex) {
942         ex.printStackTrace();
943       }
944     }
945     if (this.executorService != null) this.executorService.shutdown();
946     if (this.healthCheckChore != null) {
947       this.healthCheckChore.interrupt();
948     }
949   }

951   private static Thread getAndStartBalancerChore(final HMaster master) {
952     String name = master.getServerName() + "-BalancerChore";
953     int balancerPeriod =
954       master.getConfiguration().getInt("hbase.balancer.period", 300000);
955     // Start up the load balancer chore
956     Chore chore = new Chore(name, balancerPeriod, master) {
957       @Override
958       protected void chore() {
959         master.balance();
960       }
961     };
962     return Threads.setDaemonThreadRunning(chore.getThread());
963   }

967       this.balancerChore.interrupt();
968     }
969     if (this.catalogJanitorChore != null) {
970       this.catalogJanitorChore.interrupt();
971     }
972   }

1025   /**
1026    * @return Maximum time we should run balancer for
1027    */
1028   private int getBalancerCutoffTime() {
1029     int balancerCutoffTime =
1030       getConfiguration().getInt("hbase.balancer.max.balancing", -1);
1031     if (balancerCutoffTime == -1) {
1032       // No time period set so create one -- do half of balancer period.
1033       int balancerPeriod =
1034         getConfiguration().getInt("hbase.balancer.period", 300000);
1035       balancerCutoffTime = balancerPeriod / 2;
1036       // If nonsense period, set it to balancerPeriod
1037       if (balancerCutoffTime <= 0) balancerCutoffTime = balancerPeriod;
1038     }
1039     return balancerCutoffTime;
1040   }
1041 
1042   @Override
1043   public boolean balance() {
1044     // if master not initialized, don't run balancer.
1045     if (!this.initialized) {
1046       LOG.debug("Master has not been initialized, don't run balancer.");
1047       return false;
1048     }
1049     // If balance not true, don't run balancer.
1050     if (!this.balanceSwitch) return false;
1051     // Do this call outside of synchronized block.
1052     int maximumBalanceTime = getBalancerCutoffTime();
1053     long cutoffTime = System.currentTimeMillis() + maximumBalanceTime;
1054     boolean balancerRan;
1055     synchronized (this.balancer) {
1056       // Only allow one balance run at at time.
1057       if (this.assignmentManager.isRegionsInTransition()) {
1058         LOG.debug("Not running balancer because " +
1059           this.assignmentManager.getRegionsInTransition().size() +
1060           " region(s) in transition: " +
1061           org.apache.commons.lang.StringUtils.
1062             abbreviate(this.assignmentManager.getRegionsInTransition().toString(), 256));
1063         return false;
1064       }
1065       if (this.serverManager.areDeadServersInProgress()) {
1066         LOG.debug("Not running balancer because processing dead regionserver(s): " +
1067           this.serverManager.getDeadServers());
1068         return false;
1069       }
1070 
1071       if (this.cpHost != null) {
1072         try {
1073           if (this.cpHost.preBalance()) {
1074             LOG.debug("Coprocessor bypassing balancer request");
1075             return false;
1076           }
1077         } catch (IOException ioe) {
1078           LOG.error("Error invoking master coprocessor preBalance()", ioe);
1079           return false;
1080         }
1081       }
1082 
1083       Map<String, Map<ServerName, List<HRegionInfo>>> assignmentsByTable =
1084         this.assignmentManager.getAssignmentsByTable();
1085 
1086       List<RegionPlan> plans = new ArrayList<RegionPlan>();
1087       for (Map<ServerName, List<HRegionInfo>> assignments : assignmentsByTable.values()) {
1088         List<RegionPlan> partialPlans = this.balancer.balanceCluster(assignments);
1089         if (partialPlans != null) plans.addAll(partialPlans);
1090       }
1091       int rpCount = 0;  // number of RegionPlans balanced so far
1092       long totalRegPlanExecTime = 0;
1093       balancerRan = plans != null;
1094       if (plans != null && !plans.isEmpty()) {
1095         for (RegionPlan plan: plans) {
1096           LOG.info("balance " + plan);
1097           long balStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
1098           this.assignmentManager.balance(plan);
1099           totalRegPlanExecTime += System.currentTimeMillis()-balStartTime;
1100           rpCount++;
1101           if (rpCount < plans.size() &&
1102               // if performing next balance exceeds cutoff time, exit the loop
1103               (System.currentTimeMillis() + (totalRegPlanExecTime / rpCount)) > cutoffTime) {
1104             LOG.debug("No more balancing till next balance run; maximumBalanceTime=" +
1105               maximumBalanceTime);
1106             break;
1107           }
1108         }
1109       }
1110       if (this.cpHost != null) {
1111         try {
1112           this.cpHost.postBalance();
1113         } catch (IOException ioe) {
1114           // balancing already succeeded so don't change the result
1115           LOG.error("Error invoking master coprocessor postBalance()", ioe);
1116         }
1117       }
1118     }
1119     return balancerRan;
1120   }
1121 
1122   enum BalanceSwitchMode {
1123     SYNC,
1124     ASYNC
1125   }
1126   /**
1127    * Assigns balancer switch according to BalanceSwitchMode
1128    * @param b new balancer switch
1129    * @param mode BalanceSwitchMode
1130    * @return old balancer switch
1131    */
1132   public boolean switchBalancer(final boolean b, BalanceSwitchMode mode) {
1133     boolean oldValue = this.balanceSwitch;
1134     boolean newValue = b;
1135     try {
1136       if (this.cpHost != null) {
1137         newValue = this.cpHost.preBalanceSwitch(newValue);
1138       }
1139       if (mode == BalanceSwitchMode.SYNC) {
1140         synchronized (this.balancer) {        
1141           this.balanceSwitch = newValue;
1142         }
1143       } else {
1144         this.balanceSwitch = newValue;        
1145       }
1146       LOG.info("BalanceSwitch=" + newValue);
1147       if (this.cpHost != null) {
1148         this.cpHost.postBalanceSwitch(oldValue, newValue);
1149       }
1150     } catch (IOException ioe) {
1151       LOG.warn("Error flipping balance switch", ioe);
1152     }
1153     return oldValue;    
1154   }
1155   
1156   @Override
1157   public boolean synchronousBalanceSwitch(final boolean b) {
1158     return switchBalancer(b, BalanceSwitchMode.SYNC);
1159   }
1160   
1161   @Override
1162   public boolean balanceSwitch(final boolean b) {
1163     return switchBalancer(b, BalanceSwitchMode.ASYNC);
1164   }

1176   @Override
1177   public void move(final byte[] encodedRegionName, final byte[] destServerName)
1178   throws UnknownRegionException {
1179     Pair<HRegionInfo, ServerName> p =
1180       this.assignmentManager.getAssignment(encodedRegionName);
1181     if (p == null)
1182       throw new UnknownRegionException(Bytes.toStringBinary(encodedRegionName));
1183     ServerName dest = null;
1184     if (destServerName == null || destServerName.length == 0) {
1185       LOG.info("Passed destination servername is null or empty so choosing a server at random");
1186       List<ServerName> destServers = this.serverManager.getOnlineServersList();
1187       destServers.remove(p.getSecond());
1188       // If i have only one RS then destination can be null.
1189       dest = balancer.randomAssignment(destServers);
1190     } else {
1191       dest = new ServerName(Bytes.toString(destServerName));
1192       if (dest.equals(p.getSecond())) {
1193         LOG.debug("Skipping move of region " + p.getFirst().getRegionNameAsString()
1194           + " because region already assigned to the same server " + dest + ".");
1195         return;
1196       }
1197     }
1198     
1199     // Now we can do the move
1200     RegionPlan rp = new RegionPlan(p.getFirst(), p.getSecond(), dest);
1201     
1202     try {
1203       checkInitialized();
1204       if (this.cpHost != null) {
1205         if (this.cpHost.preMove(p.getFirst(), p.getSecond(), dest)) {
1206           return;
1207         }
1208       }
1209       LOG.info("Added move plan " + rp + ", running balancer");
1210       this.assignmentManager.balance(rp);
1211       if (this.cpHost != null) {
1212         this.cpHost.postMove(p.getFirst(), p.getSecond(), dest);
1213       }
1214     } catch (IOException ioe) {
1215       UnknownRegionException ure = new UnknownRegionException(
1216           Bytes.toStringBinary(encodedRegionName));
1217       ure.initCause(ioe);
1218       throw ure;
1219     }
1220   }
1221 
1222   public void createTable(HTableDescriptor hTableDescriptor,
1223     byte [][] splitKeys)
1224   throws IOException {
1225     if (!isMasterRunning()) {
1226       throw new MasterNotRunningException();
1227     }
1228 
1229     HRegionInfo [] newRegions = getHRegionInfos(hTableDescriptor, splitKeys);
1230     checkInitialized();
1231     if (cpHost != null) {
1232       cpHost.preCreateTable(hTableDescriptor, newRegions);
1233     }
1234 
1235     this.executorService.submit(new CreateTableHandler(this,
1236       this.fileSystemManager, this.serverManager, hTableDescriptor, conf,
1237       newRegions, catalogTracker, assignmentManager));
1238 
1239     if (cpHost != null) {
1240       cpHost.postCreateTable(hTableDescriptor, newRegions);
1241     }
1242   }
1243 
1244   private HRegionInfo[] getHRegionInfos(HTableDescriptor hTableDescriptor,
1245     byte[][] splitKeys) {
1246     HRegionInfo[] hRegionInfos = null;
1247     if (splitKeys == null || splitKeys.length == 0) {
1248       hRegionInfos = new HRegionInfo[]{
1249           new HRegionInfo(hTableDescriptor.getName(), null, null)};
1250     } else {
1251       int numRegions = splitKeys.length + 1;
1252       hRegionInfos = new HRegionInfo[numRegions];
1253       byte[] startKey = null;
1254       byte[] endKey = null;
1255       for (int i = 0; i < numRegions; i++) {
1256         endKey = (i == splitKeys.length) ? null : splitKeys[i];
1257         hRegionInfos[i] =
1258             new HRegionInfo(hTableDescriptor.getName(), startKey, endKey);
1259         startKey = endKey;
1260       }
1261     }
1262     return hRegionInfos;
1263   }

1268   }

1363   /**
1364    * Return the region and current deployment for the region containing
1365    * the given row. If the region cannot be found, returns null. If it
1366    * is found, but not currently deployed, the second element of the pair
1367    * may be null.
1368    */
1369   Pair<HRegionInfo, ServerName> getTableRegionForRow(
1370       final byte [] tableName, final byte [] rowKey)
1371   throws IOException {
1372     final AtomicReference<Pair<HRegionInfo, ServerName>> result =
1373       new AtomicReference<Pair<HRegionInfo, ServerName>>(null);
1374 
1375     MetaScannerVisitor visitor =
1376       new MetaScannerVisitorBase() {
1377         @Override
1378         public boolean processRow(Result data) throws IOException {
1379           if (data == null || data.size() <= 0) {
1380             return true;
1381           }
1382           Pair<HRegionInfo, ServerName> pair = MetaReader.parseCatalogResult(data);
1383           if (pair == null) {
1384             return false;
1385           }
1386           if (!Bytes.equals(pair.getFirst().getTableName(), tableName)) {
1387             return false;
1388           }
1389           result.set(pair);
1390           return true;
1391         }
1392     };
1393 
1394     MetaScanner.metaScan(conf, visitor, tableName, rowKey, 1);
1395     return result.get();
1396   }

1436   /**
1437    * @return cluster status
1438    */
1439   public ClusterStatus getClusterStatus() {
1440     // Build Set of backup masters from ZK nodes
1441     List<String> backupMasterStrings;
1442     try {
1443       backupMasterStrings = ZKUtil.listChildrenNoWatch(this.zooKeeper,
1444                               this.zooKeeper.backupMasterAddressesZNode);
1445     } catch (KeeperException e) {
1446       LOG.warn(this.zooKeeper.prefix("Unable to list backup servers"), e);
1447       backupMasterStrings = new ArrayList<String>(0);
1448     }
1449     List<ServerName> backupMasters = new ArrayList<ServerName>(
1450                                           backupMasterStrings.size());
1451     for (String s: backupMasterStrings) {
1452       try {
1453         byte[] bytes = ZKUtil.getData(this.zooKeeper, ZKUtil.joinZNode(this.zooKeeper.backupMasterAddressesZNode, s));
1454         if (bytes != null) {
1455           backupMasters.add(ServerName.parseVersionedServerName(bytes));
1456         }
1457       } catch (KeeperException e) {
1458         LOG.warn(this.zooKeeper.prefix("Unable to get information about " +
1459                  "backup servers"), e);
1460       }
1461     }
1462     Collections.sort(backupMasters, new Comparator<ServerName>() {
1463       public int compare(ServerName s1, ServerName s2) {
1464         return s1.getServerName().compareTo(s2.getServerName());
1465       }});
1466 
1467     return new ClusterStatus(VersionInfo.getVersion(),
1468       this.fileSystemManager.getClusterId(),
1469       this.serverManager.getOnlineServers(),
1470       this.serverManager.getDeadServers(),
1471       this.serverName,
1472       backupMasters,
1473       this.assignmentManager.getRegionsInTransition(),
1474       this.getCoprocessors());
1475   }

1515   @Override
1516   public void abort(final String msg, final Throwable t) {
1517     if (cpHost != null) {
1518       // HBASE-4014: dump a list of loaded coprocessors.
1519       LOG.fatal("Master server abort: loaded coprocessors are: " +
1520           getLoadedCoprocessors());
1521     }
1522 
1523     if (abortNow(msg, t)) {
1524       if (t != null) LOG.fatal(msg, t);
1525       else LOG.fatal(msg);
1526       this.abort = true;
1527       stop("Aborting");
1528     }
1529   }
1530 
1531   /**
1532    * We do the following in a different thread.  If it is not completed
1533    * in time, we will time it out and assume it is not easy to recover.
1534    *
1535    * 1. Create a new ZK session. (since our current one is expired)
1536    * 2. Try to become a primary master again
1537    * 3. Initialize all ZK based system trackers.
1538    * 4. Assign root and meta. (they are already assigned, but we need to update our
1539    * internal memory state to reflect it)
1540    * 5. Process any RIT if any during the process of our recovery.
1541    *
1542    * @return True if we could successfully recover from ZK session expiry.
1543    * @throws InterruptedException
1544    * @throws IOException
1545    * @throws KeeperException
1546    * @throws ExecutionException
1547    */
1548   private boolean tryRecoveringExpiredZKSession() throws InterruptedException,
1549       IOException, KeeperException, ExecutionException {
1550 
1551     this.zooKeeper.reconnectAfterExpiration();
1552 
1553     Callable<Boolean> callable = new Callable<Boolean> () {
1554       public Boolean call() throws InterruptedException,
1555           IOException, KeeperException {
1556         MonitoredTask status =
1557           TaskMonitor.get().createStatus("Recovering expired ZK session");
1558         try {
1559           if (!becomeActiveMaster(status)) {
1560             return Boolean.FALSE;
1561           }
1562           serverShutdownHandlerEnabled = false;
1563           initialized = false;
1564           finishInitialization(status, true);
1565           return Boolean.TRUE;
1566         } finally {
1567           status.cleanup();
1568         }
1569       }
1570     };
1571 
1572     long timeout =
1573       conf.getLong("hbase.master.zksession.recover.timeout", 300000);
1574     java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor =
1575       Executors.newSingleThreadExecutor();
1576     Future<Boolean> result = executor.submit(callable);
1577     executor.shutdown();
1578     if (executor.awaitTermination(timeout, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)
1579         && result.isDone()) {
1580       Boolean recovered = result.get();
1581       if (recovered != null) {
1582         return recovered.booleanValue();
1583       }
1584     }
1585     executor.shutdownNow();
1586     return false;
1587   }
1588 
1589   /**
1590    * Check to see if the current trigger for abort is due to ZooKeeper session
1591    * expiry, and If yes, whether we can recover from ZK session expiry.
1592    *
1593    * @param msg Original abort message
1594    * @param t   The cause for current abort request
1595    * @return true if we should proceed with abort operation, false other wise.
1596    */
1597   private boolean abortNow(final String msg, final Throwable t) {
1598     if (!this.isActiveMaster) {
1599       return true;
1600     }
1601     if (t != null && t instanceof KeeperException.SessionExpiredException) {
1602       try {
1603         LOG.info("Primary Master trying to recover from ZooKeeper session " +
1604             "expiry.");
1605         return !tryRecoveringExpiredZKSession();
1606       } catch (Throwable newT) {
1607         LOG.error("Primary master encountered unexpected exception while " +
1608             "trying to recover from ZooKeeper session" +
1609             " expiry. Proceeding with server abort.", newT);
1610       }
1611     }
1612     return true;
1613   }

1681   @Override
1682   public void stop(final String why) {
1683     LOG.info(why);
1684     this.stopped = true;
1685     // We wake up the stopSleeper to stop immediately
1686     stopSleeper.skipSleepCycle();
1687     // If we are a backup master, we need to interrupt wait
1688     if (this.activeMasterManager != null) {
1689       synchronized (this.activeMasterManager.clusterHasActiveMaster) {
1690         this.activeMasterManager.clusterHasActiveMaster.notifyAll();
1691       }
1692     }
1693   }

1751   @Override
1752   public void assign(final byte [] regionName)throws IOException {
1753     checkInitialized();
1754     Pair<HRegionInfo, ServerName> pair =
1755       MetaReader.getRegion(this.catalogTracker, regionName);
1756     if (pair == null) throw new UnknownRegionException(Bytes.toString(regionName));
1757     if (cpHost != null) {
1758       if (cpHost.preAssign(pair.getFirst())) {
1759         return;
1760       }
1761     }
1762     assignRegion(pair.getFirst());
1763     if (cpHost != null) {
1764       cpHost.postAssign(pair.getFirst());
1765     }
1766   }

1774   @Override
1775   public void unassign(final byte [] regionName, final boolean force)
1776   throws IOException {
1777     checkInitialized();
1778     Pair<HRegionInfo, ServerName> pair =
1779       MetaReader.getRegion(this.catalogTracker, regionName);
1780     if (pair == null) throw new UnknownRegionException(Bytes.toString(regionName));
1781     HRegionInfo hri = pair.getFirst();
1782     if (cpHost != null) {
1783       if (cpHost.preUnassign(hri, force)) {
1784         return;
1785       }
1786     }
1787     if (force) {
1788       this.assignmentManager.regionOffline(hri);
1789       assignRegion(hri);
1790     } else {
1791       this.assignmentManager.unassign(hri, force);
1792     }
1793     if (cpHost != null) {
1794       cpHost.postUnassign(hri, force);
1795     }
1796   }

1798   /**
1799    * Get HTD array for given tables 
1800    * @param tableNames
1801    * @return HTableDescriptor[]
1802    */
1803   public HTableDescriptor[] getHTableDescriptors(List<String> tableNames) {
1804     List<HTableDescriptor> list =
1805       new ArrayList<HTableDescriptor>(tableNames.size());
1806     for (String s: tableNames) {
1807       HTableDescriptor htd = null;
1808       try {
1809         htd = this.tableDescriptors.get(s);
1810       } catch (IOException e) {
1811         LOG.warn("Failed getting descriptor for " + s, e);
1812       }

1816     return list.toArray(new HTableDescriptor [] {});

1819   @Override
1820   public <T extends CoprocessorProtocol> boolean registerProtocol(
1821       Class<T> protocol, T handler) {
1822 
1823     /* No stacking of protocol handlers is currently allowed.  The
1824      * first to claim wins!
1825      */
1826     if (protocolHandlers.containsKey(protocol)) {
1827       LOG.error("Protocol "+protocol.getName()+
1828           " already registered, rejecting request from "+
1829           handler
1830       );
1831       return false;
1832     }
1833 
1834     protocolHandlers.putInstance(protocol, handler);
1835     protocolHandlerNames.put(protocol.getName(), protocol);
1836     if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {
1837       LOG.debug("Registered master protocol handler: protocol="+protocol.getName());
1838     }
1839     return true;
1840   }
1841 
1842   @Override
1843   public ExecResult execCoprocessor(Exec call) throws IOException {
1844     Class<? extends CoprocessorProtocol> protocol = call.getProtocol();
1845     if (protocol == null) {
1846       String protocolName = call.getProtocolName();
1847       if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {
1848         LOG.debug("Received dynamic protocol exec call with protocolName " + protocolName);
1849       }
1850       // detect the actual protocol class
1851       protocol  = protocolHandlerNames.get(protocolName);
1852       if (protocol == null) {
1853         throw new HBaseRPC.UnknownProtocolException(protocol,
1854             "No matching handler for master protocol "+protocolName);
1855       }
1856     }
1857     if (!protocolHandlers.containsKey(protocol)) {
1858       throw new HBaseRPC.UnknownProtocolException(protocol,
1859           "No matching handler for protocol ");
1860     }
1861 
1862     CoprocessorProtocol handler = protocolHandlers.getInstance(protocol);
1863     Object value;
1864 
1865     try {
1866       Method method = protocol.getMethod(
1867           call.getMethodName(), call.getParameterClasses());
1868       method.setAccessible(true);
1869 
1870       value = method.invoke(handler, call.getParameters());
1871     } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {
1872       Throwable target = e.getTargetException();
1873       if (target instanceof IOException) {
1874         throw (IOException)target;
1875       }
1876       IOException ioe = new IOException(target.toString());
1877       ioe.setStackTrace(target.getStackTrace());
1878       throw ioe;
1879     } catch (Throwable e) {
1880       if (!(e instanceof IOException)) {
1881         LOG.error("Unexpected throwable object ", e);
1882       }
1883       IOException ioe = new IOException(e.toString());
1884       ioe.setStackTrace(e.getStackTrace());
1885       throw ioe;
1886     }
1887 
1888     return new ExecResult(value);
1889   }

1892    * Get all table descriptors

1895   public HTableDescriptor [] getHTableDescriptors() {

1904   }

1916   /**
1917    * Special method, only used by hbck.
1918    */
1919   @Override
1920   public void offline(final byte[] regionName) throws IOException {
1921     Pair<HRegionInfo, ServerName> pair =
1922       MetaReader.getRegion(this.catalogTracker, regionName);
1923     if (pair == null) throw new UnknownRegionException(Bytes.toStringBinary(regionName));
1924     HRegionInfo hri = pair.getFirst();
1925     this.assignmentManager.regionOffline(hri);
1926   }

1928   /**
1929    * Utility for constructing an instance of the passed HMaster class.
1930    * @param masterClass
1931    * @param conf
1932    * @return HMaster instance.
1933    */
1934   public static HMaster constructMaster(Class<? extends HMaster> masterClass,
1935       final Configuration conf)  {
1936     try {
1937       Constructor<? extends HMaster> c =
1938         masterClass.getConstructor(Configuration.class);
1939       return c.newInstance(conf);
1940     } catch (InvocationTargetException ite) {
1941       Throwable target = ite.getTargetException() != null?
1942         ite.getTargetException(): ite;
1943       if (target.getCause() != null) target = target.getCause();
1944       throw new RuntimeException("Failed construction of Master: " +
1945         masterClass.toString(), target);
1946     } catch (Exception e) {
1947       throw new RuntimeException("Failed construction of Master: " +
1948         masterClass.toString() + ((e.getCause() != null)?
1949           e.getCause().getMessage(): ""), e);
1950     }
1951   }

1993   /**
1994    * Triggers an asynchronous attempt to take a snapshot.
1995    * {@inheritDoc}
1996    */
1997   @Override
1998   public long snapshot(final HSnapshotDescription request) throws IOException {
1999     LOG.debug("Submitting snapshot request for:" +
2000         SnapshotDescriptionUtils.toString(request.getProto()));
2001     try {
2002       this.snapshotManager.checkSnapshotSupport();
2003     } catch (UnsupportedOperationException e) {
2004       throw new IOException(e);
2005     }
2006 
2007     // get the snapshot information
2008     SnapshotDescription snapshot = SnapshotDescriptionUtils.validate(request.getProto(),
2009       this.conf);
2010 
2011     snapshotManager.takeSnapshot(snapshot);
2012 
2013     // send back the max amount of time the client should wait for the snapshot to complete
2014     long waitTime = SnapshotDescriptionUtils.getMaxMasterTimeout(conf, snapshot.getType(),
2015       SnapshotDescriptionUtils.DEFAULT_MAX_WAIT_TIME);
2016     return waitTime;
2017   }

2019   /**
2020    * List the currently available/stored snapshots. Any in-progress snapshots are ignored
2021    */
2022   @Override
2023   public List<HSnapshotDescription> getCompletedSnapshots() throws IOException {
2024     List<HSnapshotDescription> availableSnapshots = new ArrayList<HSnapshotDescription>();
2025     List<SnapshotDescription> snapshots = snapshotManager.getCompletedSnapshots();
2026 
2027     // convert to writables
2028     for (SnapshotDescription snapshot: snapshots) {
2029       availableSnapshots.add(new HSnapshotDescription(snapshot));
2030     }
2031 
2032     return availableSnapshots;
2033   }

2074   /**
2075    * Execute Restore/Clone snapshot operation.
2076    *
2077    * <p>If the specified table exists a "Restore" is executed, replacing the table
2078    * schema and directory data with the content of the snapshot.
2079    * The table must be disabled, or a UnsupportedOperationException will be thrown.
2080    *
2081    * <p>If the table doesn't exist a "Clone" is executed, a new table is created
2082    * using the schema at the time of the snapshot, and the content of the snapshot.
2083    *
2084    * <p>The restore/clone operation does not require copying HFiles. Since HFiles
2085    * are immutable the table can point to and use the same files as the original one.
2086    */
2087   @Override
2088   public void restoreSnapshot(final HSnapshotDescription request) throws IOException {
2089     try {
2090       this.snapshotManager.checkSnapshotSupport();
2091     } catch (UnsupportedOperationException e) {
2092       throw new IOException(e);
2093     }
2094 
2095     snapshotManager.restoreSnapshot(request.getProto());
2096   }

2098   /**
2099    * Returns the status of the requested snapshot restore/clone operation.
2100    * This method is not exposed to the user, it is just used internally by HBaseAdmin
2101    * to verify if the restore is completed.
2102    *
2103    * No exceptions are thrown if the restore is not running, the result will be "done".
2104    *
2105    * @return done <tt>true</tt> if the restore/clone operation is completed.
2106    * @throws RestoreSnapshotExcepton if the operation failed.
2107    */
2108   @Override
2109   public boolean isRestoreSnapshotDone(final HSnapshotDescription request) throws IOException {
2110     return !snapshotManager.isRestoringTable(request.getProto());
2111   }
